name: Familiar's Eyes
summary: You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own.
description:
You use your familiar's senses as easily as your own. You project your senses into your familiar. When you do, you lose all sensory information from your own body, but you can sense through your familiar's body until you Dismiss the effect. While projecting your senses in this way, you can converse telepathically with your familiar if it understands a language.

Special This feat has the trait corresponding to the tradition of spells you cast (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).Traits

Concentrate: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

Divination: The divination school of magic typically involves obtaining or transferring information, or predicting events.
